data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (outbound_packet_errors_rate IS NULL OR outbound_packet_errors_rate < 1) AND (inbound_packet_errors_rate IS NULL OR inbound_packet_errors_rate < 1)) AS 'Health Score' FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_port FACET cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_port_name

presentation.title: VSAN Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent VSAN of this Port

presentation.title: L3 Interface Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent L3 Interface of this Port

presentation.title: Switch Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Switch of this Port

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_port_name) AS 'Ports' FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_port FACET ethernet_type

presentation.title: Ethernet Type Distribution
presentation.notes: The Ethernet Type of this Port

data.nrql: SELECT sum(inbound_packet_errors_rate) FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_port COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Inbound Packet Errors (Errors per Second)
presentation.notes: The Inbound Packet Errors of this Port

data.nrql: SELECT sum(inbound_throughput_rate) FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_port COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Inbound Throughput Rate (Bits per Second)
presentation.notes: The Inbound Bits of this Port

data.nrql: SELECT sum(outbound_packet_errors_rate) FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_port COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Outbound Packet Errors (Errors per Second)
presentation.notes: The Outbound Packet Errors of this Port

data.nrql: SELECT sum(outbound_throughput_rate_rate) FROM cisco_nexusnxapi_cisco_networking_port COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Outbound Throughput Rate (Bits per Second per Second)
presentation.notes: The Outbound Bits of this Port
